name: proposal-temporal
description: Provides standard objects and functions for working with dates and times.

scripts.poc-tsc: tsc ./polyfill/lib/poc/LocalDateTime.ts --lib ESNext --target ESNext --module ESNext --strict --isolatedModules --declaration --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --moduleResolution node --useDefineForClassFields true && mv ./polyfill/lib/poc/LocalDateTime.js ./polyfill/lib/localdatetime.mjs && mv ./polyfill/lib/poc/LocalDateTime.test.ts ./polyfill/test/localdatetime.mjs
scripts.poc-dts: tsc ./polyfill/lib/poc/LocalDateTime.ts --emitDeclarationOnly --lib ESNext --target ESNext --module ESNext --strict --isolatedModules --declaration --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --moduleResolution node --useDefineForClassFields true
scripts.poc-tsc-noemit: tsc ./polyfill/lib/poc/LocalDateTime.ts --noEmit --lib ESNext --target ESNext --module ESNext --strict --isolatedModules --declaration --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --moduleResolution node --useDefineForClassFields true
scripts.poc-dts-nocomments: tsc ./polyfill/lib/poc/LocalDateTime.ts --lib ESNext --target ESNext --module ESNext --strict --isolatedModules --declaration --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --moduleResolution node --useDefineForClassFields true --removeComments --emitDeclarationOnly && mv ./polyfill/lib/poc/LocalDateTime.d.ts ./polyfill/lib/poc/LocalDateTime.nocomments.d.ts
scripts.poc-rebuild: cd polyfill && npm run build && rm -f *.tgz && npm pack
scripts.poc-compile: npm run poc-tsc-noemit && npm run poc-dts-nocomments && npm run poc-dts && npm run poc-babel && npm run poc-babel-tests && npm run poc-postprocess && npm run poc-pretty && npm run poc-rebuild
scripts.test: cd polyfill && npm install && npm test && npm run test-cookbook && npm run test262
scripts.codecov:tests: cd polyfill && npm install && npm run codecov:tests
scripts.codecov:test262: cd polyfill && npm install && npm run codecov:test262
scripts.test-cookbook: cd polyfill && npm install && npm run test-cookbook
scripts.test262: cd polyfill && npm install && npm run test262
scripts.build:polyfill: cd polyfill && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:docs: cd docs && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:polyfill && npm run build:docs && npm run build:spec

author: Ujjwal Sharma <usharma@igalia.com>
